remarks: Combine antecedents into a single biconditional.  This inference, reminiscent of ~ ja , is reversible:  The hypotheses can be deduced from the conclusion alone (see ~ pm5.1im and ~ pm5.21im ).  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2013.)
statement:
bija.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
bija.2 $e |- ( -. ph -> ( -. ps -> ch ) ) $.
bija $p |- ( ( ph <-> ps ) -> ch ) $.
